citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the sheltered refer facility had an accumulation of grime, dirt and food debris.
Routine cleaning is important to the health and well-being of the animals housed. The licensee shall implement a more
proactive cleaning regimen to include daily spot cleaning and sanitizing.
To be corrected by : 4/1/2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the sheltered refer facility had a significant accumulation of rodent feces
throughout the entire building. Rodents can harbor disease hazards that may cause adverse health conditions for the
animals housed. The licensee shall implement a proactive pest control program to control the infestation of rodents and
remove the buildup of fecal material.
To be corrected by: 4/28/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the sheltered refer facility had an accumulation of grime, dirt and food debris. 
Routine cleaning is important to the health and well-being of the animals housed. The licensee shall implement a more 
proactive cleaning regimen to include daily spot cleaning and sanitizing. 
 
To be corrected by : 4/1/2024 
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the sheltered refer facility had a significant accumulation of rodent feces 
throughout the entire building. Rodents can harbor disease hazards that may cause adverse health conditions for the 
animals housed. The licensee shall implement a proactive pest control program to control the infestation of rodents and 
remove the buildup of fecal material. 
 
To be corrected by: 4/28/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative. 
 
 n
